name: ProofOfKeags
cooked: I don’t think it is a good idea to introduce new points on the continuum between CTV and TXHASH. By doing this it submits to the frame that we should be regulating how users want to specify spending conditions. CTV offers max specificity, TXHASH offers max generality. Any point on the interior is just going to make activation of any of these much harder.
